Check Recursively Directories For Uncommitted

Source: R/check_commit.R
check_commit.Rd

Check Recursively Directories For Uncommitted

check_commit(
  root_directory = ".",
  user = NULL,
  group = NULL,
  commit = FALSE,
  push = FALSE
)

cc(
  root_directory = ".",
  user = NULL,
  group = NULL,
  commit = FALSE,
  push = FALSE
)

Arguments

root_directory

A directory in which there are git subdirectories.

group

A (vector of) group(s) to keep or exclude with prefix "!"..

commit

A boolean. if TRUE, commits uncommitted files.

push

A boolean. if TRUE, push commits.

Value

A tibble
